h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: This plank will be even harder to cross than the first, as you'll have to not only deal with a Yaksha Archer on a small platform halfway across, but a second archer in an open cell window on the left, and another near the end of the wooden plank. Worse still -- there's a Cyan Bat hiding above the archer halfway across the plank who will divebomb you if you attempt to fight that archer, and likely send you toppling down to the level below to die from fall damage.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Upper Pagoda (Level 3)'.
The content is as follows:
This plank will be even harder to cross than the first, as you'll have to not only deal with a Yaksha Archer on a small platform halfway across, but a second archer in an open cell window on the left, and another near the end of the wooden plank. Worse still -- there's a Cyan Bat hiding above the archer halfway across the plank who will divebomb you if you attempt to fight that archer, and likely send you toppling down to the level below to die from fall damage.
